title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System
Interview Descriptions: Quick and easy. First interview with Hr and then with departmental manager, often followed by peer interview. It was a simple process for a nurse especially the interview with a representative from Human Resources.

title: Diagnostic Medical Sonography Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System (Rockford, IL) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: There will be a phone screening that is done to make sure you qualify for the position then after they believe you to be fit they will set up an in person interview.
Interview Questions: In what order would you perform these exams. GB, ectopic, torsion

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System
Interview Descriptions: I met with the recruiter.  the pay was very good. she was friendly.  She was open and wanted to pay well. I was offered the job within a week.  She didn’t put me on the spot.  She did  look at my resume and ask questions.
Interview Questions: They didn’t ask too many questions.  They wanted to know all past jobs so they could pay me fairly..

title: Information Security Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System (Rockford, IL) in Oct 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was internal, moving from a technician to IS within same department. Took four months to get interview after inquiring on the status of my application. They drilled me with advanced questions for an entry level position. I had a degree in cyber security. They ended up giving the position to an internal employee that worked a help desk position.
Interview Questions: They asked me questions from the CompTIA Security+ exam.

title: Nurse Practitioner Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System
Interview Descriptions: I met with the manager and director.  I was introduced to staff and offered an opportunity to observe the clinic for a day.  I felt like the whole process was transparent and straightforward.
Interview Questions: Tell me about how you overcame a difficult situation?

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System
Interview Descriptions: First you have a phone interview with HR. Then for your in person interview, you take a competency test then interview with HR then your manager. I wasn’t interviewed by HR because they double booked me with another applicant.
Interview Questions: What did you do at your last job?

title: Medical Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System
Interview Descriptions: Over the phone in person with manager shadow day and peer interview all were comfortable and I had an overall good experience. Lots of busy work to do which is nice

title: Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was transparent with open communication. They are willing to work with your schedule with a combination of in person and phone interviews. HR representatives are informative and extremely helpful.
Interview Questions: What makes you a good fit for SwedishAmerican?

title: COTA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: The people were very friendly and informative. The process was easy and enjoyable. I had a phone interview in the morning and an in person tour of the facilities in the afternoon.
Interview Questions: Why would you make a good member of our team?

title: Pct Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview then in person interview scheduled within 3 days, drug test, background check. Fairly easy interview process and all staff was cordial. It’s a lot of questions so be sure to come prepared to talk and come up with answers
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Swedish American

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System (Rockford, IL) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions:
Phone interview - short & to the point. HR was very nice & professional. 
Personal interview - great way to gain insight into the culture & day to day of the hospital. Manager knows a lot about the hospital.
Interview Questions: How did you want to impact the community.

title: IT Systems Engineer Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System
Interview Descriptions: Two interviews. First one was with HR which were standard HR interview questions. Second interview was with IT manager which was a more of a casual chat of past experiences and future goals.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 3 years

title: Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System (Rockford, IL) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was very long and overbearing.  Seemed like a very long process (4 interviews) with a lot of people in the room at once.  The questions were scripted and no room for conversation.
Interview Questions: Describe a moral dilemma you faced?

title: MSO Call Center Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System (Rockford, IL) in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was quite lengthy, you meet with HR, Have to complete a typing test, drug test, check references and then they call you for an interview with the manager and supervisor. During the interview process, they bring you to the call center where you get to observe and listen in on phone calls to see if it is something you would like and have a chance to ask current employee's questions as well.
Interview Questions: Do you get flustered with angry patients?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System (Rockford, IL) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: Took about 2 weeks.  Had to come back for two interviews, one with HR and the hiring manager and a second for a peer interview.  Took a few days for them to call back with an offer.
Interview Questions: Describe a time when you experienced conflict with a coworker.

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System
Interview Descriptions: Straight forward interview process.  Multiple interviews with many of the same questions asked.
Interview Questions: Are there any questions that you thought we should have asked, but didn't.

title: Pct Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at SwedishAmerican Health System (Rockford, IL) in Dec 2011
Interview Descriptions: Typical of any health system. Ability to perform duties. Qualifications. Previous experience and if there was any direct patient care. How stable are you. Dependability. Team work. How may years. Very nice people interviewing.
